intro: Mallostoma acerosum, commonly known as the hard-leaved mallostoma, is a flowering plant native to the southeastern United States. Its showy, five-petaled flowers are typically pink or purple and bloom in the summer months. Mallostoma acerosum is adapted to moist, sandy soils and thrives in partial shade to full sun.
